code: import{combineReducers,applyMiddleware,createStore}from'redux';import thunkMiddleWare from'redux-thunk';import multi from'redux-multi';import userReducer from'./userReducer';import commonReducer from'./commonReducer';import coursesReducer from'./coursesReducer';import activitiesReducer from'./activitiesReducer';var reducers=combineReducers({user:userReducer,common:commonReducer,courses:coursesReducer,activities:activitiesReducer});var store=createStore(reducers,applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleWare,multi));window.store=store;export default store;
